trans-unit.source: How to: Call an Overloaded Procedure (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 如何︰ 呼叫多載程序 (Visual Basic) |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: How to: Call an Overloaded Procedure (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 如何：呼叫多載程序 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The advantage of overloading a procedure is in the flexibility of the call.
trans-unit.target: 多載化程序的優點是在呼叫的彈性。

trans-unit.source: The calling code can obtain the information it needs to pass to the procedure and then call a single procedure name, no matter what arguments it is passing.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫程式碼可以取得的資訊，以便將傳遞至程序，然後呼叫單一程序名稱，不論所傳遞的引數。

trans-unit.source: To call a procedure that has more than one version defined
trans-unit.target: 呼叫已定義多個版本的程序

trans-unit.source: In the calling code, determine which data to pass to the procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫的程式碼，判斷哪些資料来傳遞至程序。

trans-unit.source: Write the procedure call in the normal way, presenting the data in the argument list.
trans-unit.target: 以一般方式，將資料呈現在引數清單中撰寫的程序呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Be sure the arguments match the parameter list in one of the versions defined for the procedure.
trans-unit.target: 請確定引數符合其中一個版本為程序定義中的參數清單。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to determine which version of the procedure to call.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要以判斷要呼叫的程序的版本。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] passes control to the version matching your argument list.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]將控制項傳遞到符合的引數清單的版本。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the `post` procedure declared in [How to: Define Multiple Versions of a Procedure](./how-to-define-multiple-versions-of-a-procedure.md).
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會呼叫`post`程序宣告於[How to︰ 定義程序的多個版本](./how-to-define-multiple-versions-of-a-procedure.md)。

trans-unit.source: It obtains the customer identification, determines whether it is a `String` or an `Integer`, and then in either case calls the same procedure.
trans-unit.target: 它會取得客戶識別碼、 判斷它是否為`String`或`Integer`，然後在任一情況下呼叫相同的程序。

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures#56](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-an-overloaded-procedure_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbVbcnProcedures #&56;](./codesnippet/VisualBasic/how-to-call-an-overloaded-procedure_1.vb)]
